NEWS

Source: vignettes/NEWS.qmd

v0.0.2 (2025-XX-XX)

  • v0.0.2 - v0.0.1 diff

Mostly Shiny, Conda, Docker and pkgdown support.

  • Conda: add recipe and rattler-builder (pr124, iss4)
  • Shiny: add summary app (pr122)
  • CLI: Add listing and tidy include/exclude support (pr116)
  • Add pkgdown support (pr125, iss37)
  • Add DVC support with some purple test data (pr126, iss59)
  • Add GitHub Actions for deployment of the above (pr128, iss9)

v0.0.1 (2025-06-19)

Initial release of tidywigits.

  • R pkg skeleton (pr6)
  • Add Config, File and Tool classes (pr12)
  • Add Workflow class (pr99, iss97)
  • Add Oncoanalyser class (pr52, pr101, iss39)
  • Add bump-my-version (pr10, iss3)
  • Add pre-commit hooks (pr8, iss2)
  • Add Makefile and air.toml (pr7)
  • Support for main outputs from the following WiGiTS tools:
    • Alignments (pr28, pr79, iss17, iss77)
    • Amber (pr14, iss13)
    • Bamtools (pr44, pr66, iss62, iss16)
    • Chord (pr29, pr38, iss18, iss38)
    • Cobalt (pr33, iss15)
    • Cuppa (pr30, pr68, iss19, iss67)
    • Esvee (pr87, iss61)
    • Flagstats (pr45, pr46, iss20)
    • Isofox (pr80, iss76)
    • Lilac (pr31, iss21)
    • Linx (pr50, pr89, iss22, iss88)
    • Purple (pr36, pr51, iss23, iss49)
    • Sage (pr48, pr72, pr73, iss24, iss71, iss57)
    • Sigs (pr47, iss25)
    • Virusbreakend (pr42, iss26)
    • Virusinterpreter (pr40, pr65, iss27, iss41)
  • Schema:
    • versioning (pr64, iss43)
    • guesser (pr69, iss63)
  • Vignettes:
    • Setup (pr92, iss60)
  • Tool:
    • write functionality (pr98, iss95)
    • optionally output raw parsed tibbles (pr94, iss91)
  • UML diagram (pr107, iss106)
  • DB schema (pr111, iss110)
  • CLI support (pr114)
